div.h1: COVID-19, Coronavirus Update from the District

a.title: COVID-19, Coronavirus Update from the District

div.a: COVID-19, Coronavirus Update from the District

a.title: COVID-19, Coronavirus Update from the District

div.a: COVID-19, Coronavirus Update from the District

nav.div: Bozeman Public Schools » District News » COVID-19, Coronavirus Update from the District

div.div: COVID-19, Coronavirus Update from the District

img.p:
The safety of our students and staff continues to be our utmost priority. The District is monitoring the 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation with the Gallatin City-County Health Department (GCCHD).
School Closure Extended
On April 7 Governor Bullock extended the March 26 Stay-at-Home Directive including school closures through April 24, 2020. April 7, 2020 Extension
Meal Pick-up Update (Effective March 30th)

li.span: Pick-up on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday ONLY
Two days’ worth of food will be given

ul.li: Children do not have to be present to pick-up meals
Gallatin Valley Food Bank 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM (daily meal pick-up offered at this site)

a.title: Mental Health Resources for K12 Educators
Mental Health Resources for K12 Educators

li.a: ental Health Resources for K12 Educators

a.title: Link to Google Document about Tips on how to talk to your children about the Coronavirus

li.a: Tips for how to talk to your children about the Coronavirus

ul.li: See CDC travel page for travel restrictions and country level status. https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/travelers/after-travel-precautions.html
See newest CDC guidelines for travel within the state. https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/travelers/travel-in-the-us.html

a.title: Link to Frequently Asked Questions Google Document

img.p:
Is it OK to use a disinfectant on my Apple product?
Using a 70 percent isopropyl alcohol wipe or Clorox Disinfecting Wipes, you may gently wipe the hard, nonporous surfaces of your Apple product, such as the display, keyboard, or other exterior surfaces. Don't use bleach. Avoid getting moisture in any opening, and don't submerge your Apple product in any cleaning agents. Don't use on fabric or leather surfaces.

ul.li: Here is the entire article: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204172

img.p: The Montana Department of Public Health & Human Services has created a COVID-19 specific webpage with information and resources. The CDC also maintains a webpage with COVID-19 information. Additional information may be found at:

li.a: CDC Article - When and How to Wash Your Hands
CDC Video - Definition, symptoms, and prevention
